text: I'm drew pinsky and I'm going to show
you how they make ice cream in Thailand
[Music]
when it comes to desserts few places are
more innovative than Thailand they have
essentially invented a new concept of
ice cream called ice cream rolls it can
be found in any speed food market around
the country like right here in Chiang
Mai the cooking process is almost as
enjoyable as the delicious taste step
number one place your order I'm picking
my flavor now there's so much to choose
from step number two watch them pour a
milk based liquid onto a freezing cold
metal disc or a nice grill step number
three take a spatula and spread the
oozing liquid around the surface kind of
like making a crepe step number four
after the ice cream hardens use the
spatula to cut thin strips rolled up
into a cigar light shape step number
five assemble the strip's neatly into a
cup and add any topping of your choice
step number six devour
[Music]
oh yeah I just realized how gross it is
to cheers ice cream butter it's actually
really cheap for two ice creams it's
only six dollars - $3 each thailand's
ice cream rolls is where entertainment
meets dessert and it would almost be a
crime not to try it on your next trip to
the Land of Smiles oh if we got the
dance that means that it's really good a
second way
